verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All my life I had a longing For a drink from some clear spring, That I hoped would quench the burning Of the thirst I felt within.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Hallelujah! I have found Him Whom my soul so long has craved! Jesus satisfies my longings, Through His blood I now am saved.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Feeding on the husks around me, Till my strength was almost gone, Longed my soul for something better, Only still to hunger on.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Poor I was, and sought for riches, Something that would satisfy, But the dust I gathered round me Only mocked my soulâ€™s sad cry.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Well of water, ever springing, Bread of life so rich and free, Untold wealth that never faileth, My Redeemer is to me.
